snippet.title: Man critical after being pulled from burning home
snippet.content: A MAN is in a critical condition after he was dragged from a burning home in Adelaide's northwest. Firefighters were dispatched to the unit on Russ Ave in Seaton just after 5.30pm on Saturday. When they arrived, they dragged an unconscious man from the home. Paramedics worked on the man in his 60s outside the property for around 20 minutes before transporting him to the Royal Adelaide Hospital. He is in a critical condition and remains unresponsive, SA Ambulance say. The house fire was quickly extinguished by firefighters. MORE TO COME
